componentInstanceProperties.value: Get the most out of your OpenStax account

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue

With your instructor account, you have exclusive access to all of our ancillaries — including test banks, LMS course cartridges, and lecture slides, and more. 

Getting started is simple, our 2-minute video below will walk you through how to access and use all of our resources! Feel free to follow along and navigate our resources while you watch.
